name: Darkside Adventures (AGwaK2)
description:
No time for vacations when you're the Imp King's Arch-Chancellor, oh no! How about you go on a quest to find the king's girlfriend's lost crown instead? And shoot stars at stuff? And also save the world? And kick some koala butt along the way?

This game is at its core a metroidvania with a level selection map. The game gets quite serious after the first few levels, so good luck completing this one! High points are probably the secret levels and bosses, throw-able princesses and wall-running.

As me second-ish platformer, this game turned out kind of okay. It's just very hard overall. But Sean Cameron's soundtrack is totally awesome! Maybe that'll help.
